scripts.build: yarn build:esm && yarn build:examples-babel && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:browser && yarn flow-types build
scripts.build-ssr: CI=false && yarn build && cd examples/packages/ssr && yarn build
scripts.build:parcel: yarn build:browser && yarn build:esm && ttsc --build examples/packages/parcel/tsconfig.json && yarn workspace @compiled/parcel-app build
scripts.build:webpack: yarn build:browser && yarn build:examples-babel && ttsc --build examples/packages/webpack/tsconfig.json && yarn workspace @compiled/webpack-app build
scripts.build:webpack:extract: yarn build:browser && yarn build:examples-babel && ttsc --build examples/packages/webpack/tsconfig.json && cd examples/packages/webpack && EXTRACT_TO_CSS=true yarn build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf test/dead-code-elimination/dist && rm -f test/dead-code-elimination/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && workspaces-run -- rm -rf dist -- rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo -- rm -f tsconfig.browser.tsbuildinfo -- rm -rf build -- rm -rf tsconfig.cjs.tsbuildinfo -- rm -rf tsconfig.esm.tsbuildinfo
scripts.release: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn changeset publish
scripts.start: npx nodemon --exec "yarn build && start-storybook -p 6006 --ci" --watch packages/babel-plugin/ -e tsx
scripts.start:parcel: yarn build:browser && yarn build:esm && ttsc --build examples/packages/parcel/tsconfig.json && yarn workspace @compiled/parcel-app start
scripts.start:ssr: yarn build && cd examples/packages/ssr && yarn start
scripts.start:webpack: yarn build:browser && yarn build:examples-babel && ttsc --build examples/packages/webpack/tsconfig.json && yarn workspace @compiled/webpack-app start
scripts.start:webpack:extract: yarn build:browser && yarn build:examples-babel && ttsc --build examples/packages/webpack/tsconfig.json && cd examples/packages/webpack && EXTRACT_TO_CSS=true yarn start
